Class EpidemicCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.AdventureCard
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.EpidemicCard.EpidemicCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewableCard, Serializable
public class EpidemicCard extends AdventureCard implements Serializable, ViewableCard
The EpidemicCard class represents a specific type of AdventureCard that initiates an epidemic event in the game. This card affects the state of player ships and triggers necessary updates to the game model and observable elements. EpidemicCard is a subclass of AdventureCard and implements the ViewableCard interface. It provides functionality for applying card effects and rendering the card view in different game phases.

  • Method Details

    • activateEffect

      public void activateEffect(InputCommand command)
      Applies the epidemic effect as defined by this card to all players' shipboards. The effect removes crew members from certain tiles based on specific conditions and updates the game state and observable model accordingly.
      Specified by:
      activateEffect in class AdventureCard
      Parameters:
      command - an InputCommand object that may influence the behavior of the effect depending on its properties or state.
